casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Montanelle Deangelo POSEY 314A17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 12, 2017 Hannah H. Love, Assistant Appellate Defender, for Posey, Montanelle DeAngelo. Heather Haney, Assistant Attorney General, Wes Saunders, Assistant Attorney General, Roxann L. Vaneekhoven, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 2nd of October 2017 by State of NC to Substitute Counsel:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 12th of October 2017."
